SUBJECT:   Dear Friend
  Dear Friend
My name is Rev Solomon Diko, the Human Resources Manager with the United Nations.
I came across your profile which impressed me and i decided to contact you for a business / investment of a total amount of US$1,965,502,500.00 (One Billion Nine Hundred and Sixty Five Million Five Hundred and Two Thousand and five hundred United States Dollars) which i will like to be well invested in your Country.
You will not spend any money of your own in this business as I will secure every document for a smooth completion of this investment in your name without any problem by the global financial monetary agencies ok.
Your earlier response is required so that I can detail more on this business.
Kindly Contact me on my secondary Email: 
revsolomon1@outlook.com

revsolomondiko@gmail.com
Regards
Rev Solomon Diko
Human Resources Manager with the United Nations.
GOOD INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY FOR YOUR LIFE AND FOREVER   
From: r*********1@outlook.com
To: lm19099@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-23 18:34:07
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Friend
Dear Friend.
Thanks for your response and sorry for the late response of your email.
I want to assure you that this transaction is 100% real and genuine and i will provide every documents for the release of this fund down to your local bank account without any problem
Your share in this transaction is 30% while i will take 70%
Below are the eight main investments I wish to invest the money in
(1)    Real Estate
(2)    Hotels
(3)    Transportations
(4)    Agriculture
(5)    Production
(6)    Gold and Diamond
(7)    Oil and Gas / Refinery
(8)     Mining of Mineral resources of any kind.
What do you think?
Secondly I need your personal information below so that my lawyer can prepare an investment agreement (MOU) for us to proceed.
1.       Your Full Name.
2.       Your house and office address.
3.       Your Sex
4.       A scan copy of your identity.
5.       Your telephone number.
6.       Your country.
7.        Your Occupation
My identity is attached to this message for your perusal.
I wait for your response so that we can proceed.
Regards
Rev Solomon Diko
Human Resources Manager with the United Nations.
